org.arl.fjage

Interface MessageFilter


  • public interface MessageFilter
    An interface for a message filter. A message filter allows selection of a subset of messages from a set of messages. Message filters are typically used to select messages meeting a certain criteria from the incoming message queue.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean matches(Message m)
      Returns true if a message matches the criteria, false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • matches

        boolean matches(Message m)
        Returns true if a message matches the criteria, false otherwise. An implementing class must override this method to provide the appropriate selection criteria for the message filter.
        Parameters:
        m - message to check.
        Returns:
        true if the message matches the criteria, false otherwise.
